name: cecilia-css
description: A set of tools for quick development of web interfaces.

scripts.build: npx sass ./src/cecilia.scss:./dist/cecilia.css ./src/docs/sample.scss:./docs/assets/sample.css && npx sass --style=compressed ./src/cecilia.scss:./dist/cecilia.min.css && npx sass --style=compressed ./src/cecilia.scss:./docs/assets/cecilia.min.css
scripts.watch: npx sass --watch ./src/cecilia.scss:./dist/cecilia.css ./src/sample.scss:./dist/sample.css & npx sass --style=compressed ./src/cecilia.scss:./dist/cecilia.min.css & npx sass --style=compressed ./src/cecilia.scss:./docs/assets/cecilia.min.css
